message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. As a starting point, I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the deal, I'm looking to spend closer to $8000.  Let me know if you're willing to come down a bit.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm still confident in the value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8500. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
